title: Google\Cloud\OsConfig\V1\ListInventoriesRequest
name: ListInventoriesRequest
description:
A request message for listing inventory data for all VMs in the specified location.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.osconfig.v1.ListInventoriesRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.parent
params.description: Required. The parent resource name. Format: projects/{project}/locations/{location}/instances/- For {project}, either project-number or project-id can be provided.

params.name: data.view
params.description: Inventory view indicating what information should be included in the inventory resource. If unspecified, the default view is BASIC.

params.name: data.page_size
params.description: The maximum number of results to return.

params.name: data.page_token
params.description: A pagination token returned from a previous call to ListInventories that indicates where this listing should continue from.

params.name: data.filter
params.description: If provided, this field specifies the criteria that must be met by a Inventory API resource to be included in the response.
